title: Sportscast - October 21, 2015
text:

Updated: Wed, Oct 21 2015, 11:18 PM 
The full sportscast from the CBS 2 News at 10 on October 21, 2015. Related Stories   Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines.
